summary: A unified processor that combines an image preprocessing component with a Llama tokenizer, delivering a single interface for preparing multimodal inputs, handling token‑to‑visual element mappings, scaling, padding, and decoding of model outputs.
business_intent: Simplify the integration of image and text data for Fuyu‑based models, allowing developers to streamline preprocessing and post‑processing steps in AI applications such as visual question answering, document analysis, and other multimodal tasks.
